Short Life is an exciting game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, you will embark on a perilous journey as a video game hero, where the stakes are high and every move counts. The objective is to guide your hero safely through each level and ensure their survival until the end.

However, be prepared for a multitude of dangers and obstacles that can abruptly end your hero's life. Whether it's being sliced by a saw, squashed like a mashed potato, impaled by an arrow, or blown up by an explosive barrel, there are countless creative ways for your character to meet their demise.

While the primary goal is to reach the end of all 16 levels with your hero intact, you can also have some morbid fun exploring the various ways your character can meet their untimely end. It's a game that tests your reflexes, problem-solving skills, and ability to navigate treacherous environments.

If you're up for the challenge, you can play Short Life for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. Can you conquer all the levels and spare your character from a gruesome fate? Give it a try and find out!
